Energy

class ase2sprkkr.input_parameters.test.grammar_types.basic.Energy(prefix=None, postfix=None, format='', after_format=None, default_value=None, condition=None, after_convert=None, description='', min=None, max=None, nan=None)[source]

The grammar type for energy. The default units are Rydberg, one can specify eV.
